历经岁月至今，华山派已是武林中声名显赫的名门正派，而华山派的武功尤其是剑术经过百:
Throughout the years, the Huashan School has become a famous school of martial arts, and the martial arts of the Huashan School, especially the sword art, has formed a complete set of sword art system after more than a hundred years of development, and then refined by generations of Huashan School masters, the Huashan School sword art has become more and more exquisite, and the reputation of the martial arts has been shocked, so the Huashan School is also known as the Huashan Sword School.
The sword meaning of the Huashan School is taken from the word "strange and dangerous" of Mount Huashan in the west. The infinite scenery of Mount Huashan lies in the two words "strange and dangerous", and "strange and dangerous" are often reflected in the beauty, therefore, the swordplay of Mount Huashan is strange, precipitous and far-reaching, and the stance is full of the meaning of "winning in the middle of danger".

 <color=#FF5100FF> "New Player Advice" </color> 

After the game starts, you can go to the "Heavenly Book Pavilion" to open the "Hidden Martial Arts Academy" as soon as possible.

It is recommended that you keep trying to overcome the challenges of the various Jianghu schools in the "Hidden Martial Arts Ring" during the game.

Remember, for each level of challenge you complete, you will receive a corresponding amount of <color=#00E0C2FF> "The Secret Book of Heaven" </color>. Use the "Secret Book of Heaven" to exchange it for the secret techniques in the "Hidden Martial Arts Academy" martial arts library.

"The Hidden Martial Arts Academy has five levels of martial arts: "Beginner", "Advanced", "Elite", "Master" and "Ultimate".

By completing the "Hidden Martial Arts Ring" challenge, you can not only accumulate more <color=#00E0C2FF> "Heavenly Book Secret Palette" </color>, but also unlock and open the higher level martial arts library in exchange for more advanced <color=#FFA41BFF> "Kung Fu Secrets" </color>, effectively refining your martial arts combat level.

Also known as Tokyo Sword Discussion, on September 8 of every other year, a large number of martial artists will flock to Bianjing Daxiangguo Temple. Because of the inscription of Taizu in the past, Bianjing is very tolerant of the surge of martial artists, and often prepares in advance and deploys additional manpower to avoid people getting drunk and causing trouble.

On the day of the sword discussion, there will be 32 great warriors sent by various northern sects and organization forces to compete, which can be said to be an annual festival in Tokyo.

The Chamber of Commerce in the north will also welcome the annual "Catch the Tide Day", and many merchants from the surrounding cities will take this opportunity to enter Bianjing.

 <color=#FF5100FF> "New players' suggestions for the Hidden Martial Arts Tournament" </color> 

After the game starts, you can go to "Tianshu Pavilion" as soon as possible to open the "Hidden Martial Arts Academy", then you can redeem the "Martial Arts Library" in the secret manuals to cultivate and improve your strength.

 <color=#00E0C2FF> The "Secret Book of Heaven" is available at </color>. Use the "Secret Book of Heaven" to exchange it for the secret techniques in the "Hidden Martial Arts Academy" martial arts library.

The "Hidden Martial Arts Academy" has five levels of martial arts: "Beginner", "Advanced", "Elite", "Master" and "Ultimate".

By completing the "Hidden Martial Arts Ring" challenge, you can not only accumulate more <color=#00E0C2FF> "Heavenly Book Secret Palette" </color>, but also unlock and open the higher level martial arts library in exchange for more advanced <color=#FFA41BFF> "Kung Fu Secrets" </color>, effectively refining your martial arts combat level.

In 693, the first "Jie Ding" was won by Qing Wang Temple. At the end of the same year, the Heavenly Book Pavilion released the first list of Heavenly Books, which ranked all the world's rivers and lakes, heroes and warriors, and anecdotes.

Since then, every six years, the "Jie Ding Jian" has become a competition for the "Martial Arts Master" of all Jianghu forces. However, not all the rivers and lakes forces are qualified to enter the ring of the "Top Sword Discussion", and the Heavenly Book Pavilion first divided the sword discussion into two, with the northern and southern forces sending their own "martial arts representatives" to compete with each other during the six years.

In the end, the top 16 forces in the "Sword Talking Points List" could send their strongest "Martial Representative" to compete for the title of "Martial Master" and "Number One in the World". The title of "Number One in the World".

Nowadays, the "Heavenly Book on Swords" is also prosperous, and the book-holder will turn the "North and South on Swords" into four major sword discussions.
